h2.a: Cologne Academy: Voted Best Public School six years in a row by Sun Patriot readers. Thank You!

img.alt: Cologne Academy: Voted Best Public School six years in a row by Sun Patriot readers. Thank You!

div.p: PBIS Pride Star WayDownload … Continue Reading
Create a content-rich learning environment that prepares K-8 children to achieve their best as students and as people of character who will contribute skill and knowledge to their communities.
To prepare students for academic success through excellence in literacy by integrating the Core Knowledge Sequence.
Find all of your Educational Resources in one spot! Discover Common Core Standards information, Social Skills, and Educational Games information as well.
Need to get in touch or find our where Cologne Academy is located? Find all contact information here.

article.class: post-12232 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky category-announcements category-general-news entry

div.p: NOW ENROLLING! We are currently taking enrollment forms for next school year. We are excited to have your child be part of our school community of learners. At Cologne Academy, we commit to you an excellent educational environment that is safe and supports the learning of all students. We offer a rich, rigorous curriculum […]
